jobDescription: Lab Data Analyst  The Lab Data Analyst maintains responsibility for the Laboratory Computer System to maintain maximum efficiency of operation. This includes:Coordinating and performing computer training for Hospital personnel.Writing and maintaining complete documentation of duties and procedures performed with Laboratory Information System (LIS).Maintaining an active relationship with computer vendors and Hospital's Information Technology Department.Requirements:B.S. degree in Medical Technology with 2 years LIS experienceor B.S. degree in Computer Science with 2 years System Analyst experienceor at least 3 years LIS experience.
